monogr.title: A Digital Dictionary of Shawi Arabic

prefixDef.p: Private URIs using the teiCorpusHeader prefix are pointers to any element in the SHAWI teiCorpus document.
Private URIs using the share prefix are pointers to audio file residing on the SHAWI network share.
Private URIs using the geo prefix are pointers to the xml:id attribute on a place element in VICAV Geodata list.
Private URIs using the zotid prefix are pointers to the xml:id attribute on a biblStruct element in the TEI export of the VICAV Zotero Group library.
Private URIs using the dict prefix are pointers to the xml:id attribute on a entry in the SHAWI glossary.
Private URIs using the rend prefix are pointers to the xml:id attribute on a rendition element in VICAV rendition library.
Private URIs using the assets prefix are pointers to the location of the SHAWI media assets.

spanGrp.span: Once upon a time, master, in one of the villages, there was a shepherd. In the past, the shepherds were very much recognized as persons with (important) tasks.
He grazed the sheep, my brother. He ate cheese, he ate butter, he ate cream, he ate yoghurt and he drank ayran.
He did not know cigarettes nor did he know Cola. He did not know Cola. All his food was healthy with many vitamins.
This shepherd’s age was twenty or twenty one years. He used to eat honey, everything of this food was good, also the meat.

My brother, one day when he was grazing his sheep and… I don’t know, he looked at him and realizied that his penis has become erected. He had a boner like a stick and it didn’t go limp (lit. it did not sleep).

It stayed erected in the thingy, in his long dress. When he came back home his family looked at him (saying), “How come, what is this, my son?” He said, ‘By God, my father, what is this this stick which I have? Once it has stood up it does not go limp. Tsk!”
They looked at him and (saw) that it did not go limp. He was not yet married, my brother.
They had not yet married him. So, his father took him and said, “I will bring you to the town, to the doctor.”
He brought him to the doctor and when he had brought him there he asked for a doctor and found one. He brought him to the doctor.
But he did not find the doctor in his office, in his surgery, but in his house.
When he came to his house he said, “Dear Doctor, my son has stayed outside.” “What’s wrong with him, my brother, tell me!”
He said, “Our son suffers from this and that, he has become ill.”
He said, “Bring him inside!” He brought him inside, the doctor gave him an injection, and his penis went limb. They took him back home.
Some days after they had left, the doctor told it to his wife. The doctor’s virility was weak.
He said to his wife, “O my wife, you can’t imagine but there came a patient to me, a shepherd, he had a boner like a stick. You can say a cane. I gave him an injection and so I made it go limp.
The wife got an appetite for him and said, “Wow! If only this penis would come to me!”
The doctor’s wife said, “What a doctor he is! You don’t have such things.”

The shepherd went around and after a week or so his penis erected again. But this time he felt ashamed and said, “I don’t go again to my father, it’s a shame. I know the doctor, so I will go to the doctor alone.
And he should give me another injection and then will come back to my sheep.” He did not tell it to his family.
Tsk! He went again to the doctor, he knew his house. He came and knocked the door.
He knocked the door. Last time the doctor was at home but this time he had gone to his office, to the centre, to his surgery.
This time his wife appeared. When the women appeared she looked and, lo and behold, his penis was erected like a stick.
She said, “What’s wrong with you?” He said, “Here there is a doctor and recently I came and he cured me. Now I have come again to him because I am ill again, I am not well.
She said to him, “Come inside and I will cure you.” He came inside and said to the woman, “How will you cure me!” She said, “Come in! Come!”
As soon as he had entered, the women pulled off her trousers, laid down and her thingy appeared. She said, “Bring your stick and put it here!
Put your stick here and it will immediately go limp by itself. He put his stick into her vagina and lublublub screwed her. In a moment it went limp.
He got up, pulled up his trousers and went to the fields; he went back to his sheep.
He went back to his sheep and the woman did not tell it to her husband (that he was there).

After two or three days he again got an erection. Again he suffered from that illness. However, perhaps he made it erected himself, because he had seen how nice a vagina is. He had screwed the doctor’s wife
So, he came another time to him, to the town. He knocked the door but, lo and behold, the doctor appeared. It was not the woman who had opened the door.

When he came again (the doctor said), “What’s wrong with you?” He said, “As you can see, I have got an erection again.” He said, “Okay, come in and I will give you an injection.” He said, “No, I don’t accept this!”

He said, “Why not?” He said, “Recently, when I came here, there was a woman and she made it go limp without an injection. She just put it here in a hole and it went limp by itself. But you just kill me and hurt me.” – Enjoy it! Hahahaha!
